Class AbstractLampEvent

Direct Known Subclasses:
DecreaseLamp, IncreaseLamp, SwitchOffLamp, SwitchOnLamp
public class AbstractLampEvent extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.es.events.ES_Event
The abstract class AbstractLampEvent enforces a common type for all lamp simulation events.
